text: landila bu bela kifu ki zinganga Nzambi, niandi wubuilu tsombo mu kota mu vinga ki nlongo1.9 Banganga Nzambi ziawu kaka ziba minsua mu kota mu vinga kilutidi nlongo. Mutu wunkaka niandi kota kafueti fua. ki Pfumu mu diambu di yoka ansa1.9 AnsaÂ : biti bintotulanga tsudi yikitoko bu biyokolo ku mbazu..
